column2: "M’enyi gyee ber a wɔsee me dɛ
"Jerusalɛm a wɔakyekyer wo Dɛ kurow a ɔayɛ pepeepe:"

column4: Ama wɔdze ndaase aama EWURADZE ne dzin
column5: Dɛ mbrɛ n’ahyɛdze a ɔdze ama Israel no tse."

column2: "Na hɔ na wɔdze nhengua esisi ama atsɛmbu
column3: David ne fie nhengua no a."

column2: "Hom nserɛ asomdwee mma Jerusalɛm: Hɔn a wɔdɔ wo no bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm."
"EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ne fi ntsi Mobɔhwehwɛ wo yieyɛ."
